hero.headline: Manage Your Household Staff with Ease
hero.subtext: Track attendance, automate payroll, and keep transparent records for your domestic employees — all in one simple platform.

problems.title: Scattered Employee Records
problems.description: Contact details, documents, and notes scattered across notebooks, phones, and memory.
problems.solution: Centralized digital profiles with photos, contact info, roles, and documents in one place.

problems.title: Tedious Attendance Tracking
problems.description: Manually tracking who showed up each day is time-consuming and error-prone.
problems.solution: Present-by-default automation — only mark absences. Set recurring holidays like calendar events.

problems.title: Confusing Payroll & Advances
problems.description: Keeping track of salaries, advances, bonuses, and deductions becomes a spreadsheet nightmare.
problems.solution: Lightweight payroll system that tracks everything and maintains a transparent financial history.

problems.title: Staff Have No Visibility
problems.description: Employees often ask about their payment history or remaining holidays with no easy way to check.
problems.solution: Public employee portal where staff can view their own records using just their phone number.

features.title: Employee Profiles
features.description: Store photos, contact details, roles, and important documents for each staff member.

features.title: Automated Attendance
features.description: Present-by-default tracking means you only record absences. View everything in a calendar.

features.title: Flexible Holiday Rules
features.description: Set fixed days per month or recurring patterns like 'Every Sunday' for each employee.

features.title: Payroll Management
features.description: Track salaries, advances, bonuses, and penalties with a complete financial history.

features.title: Configurable Settings
features.description: Customize defaults for your household — currency, date formats, and notification preferences.

features.title: Multi-User Access
features.description: Invite family members to collaborate on managing household staff with role-based permissions.

testimonials.quote: Before HomeStaff, I was using a notebook to track our maid's attendance and advances. Now everything is organized and I can check it from my phone anytime.
The best part is my cook can check her own payment history on the portal. No more awkward conversations about 'how much advance did I take last month?'
We have three staff members and my wife and I both manage them. HomeStaff lets us both stay updated without double-counting or confusion.
Setting up recurring Sundays off was so simple. The app automatically knows when to expect absences vs when someone didn't show up.

pricing.headline: Free for Everyone
pricing.subtext: We're launching HomeStaff and want your feedback. Use all features completely free while we're in early access.
pricing.note: No credit card required. No hidden fees.
